tool_description: Records a new transaction in AvaTax
name: CreateTransaction
title: CreateTransaction

api_list.name: date
api_list.description:
Transaction Date - The date on the invoice, purchase order, etc.
            
By default, this date will be used to calculate the tax rates for the transaction.  If you wish to use a
different date to calculate tax rates, please specify a `taxOverride` of type `taxDate`.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://createtransaction.p.rapidapi.com/rapidapi.com"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "createtransaction.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "createtransaction.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())

api_list.name: customerCode
api_list.description:
Unique code identifying the customer that requested this transaction.
            
When you specify a `customerCode`, AvaTax will look to see if a customer exists with this code in the exemption certificate system.
If that customer exists, and if that customer has uploaded an exemption certificate that applies to this transaction, the relevant
parts of this transaction that can use the exemption certificate will be treated as exempt
api_list.code:

        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

expires_in.description: Token expires in specified milliseconds time.

api_list.name: number
api_list.description: Calculate in real time the landed cost for a basket of products.

required_parameters.name: companyId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the company that owns this item.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://createtransaction.p.rapidapi.com/api/v2/companies/3402/quotes/create"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "createtransaction.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://createtransaction.p.rapidapi.com/api/v2/companies/{companyid}/quotes/create"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "createtransaction.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
